sentences.en: As a result of collective effort, the difficult situation changed into a favourable one.
sentences.cn: 经过大家的努力, 困难的局面终于让位于顺利的局面.

sentences.en: His ability to talk tough while eating fast made a favourable impression on his dining companions.
sentences.cn: 他能一面快速地吃饭，一面言辞强硬地说话，给同他一起就餐的人留下了很好的印象。

sentences.en: His illness took a favourable turn.
His intelligence is comparatively favourable with that of his brother.
sentences.cn: 他的智力相对地比他哥哥强.

sentences.en: His recently completed chapel for Fitzwilliam is attracting favourable comment.
sentences.cn: 他最近为菲茨威廉建成的小教堂赢得了好评。

sentences.en: I heartily agree with her favourable comments on Germany and France.
sentences.cn: 我十分赞同她对德国和法国的好评。

sentences.en: It produced so much favourable comment from the press.
sentences.cn: 它在新闻界赢得了广泛的好评.

sentences.en: She made a favourable impression on his parents.
sentences.cn: 她给他的父母留下了好印象。

sentences.en: The accounts show a favourable balance of 150 yuan.
The child's condition took a favourable turn.
The company will lend you money on very favourable terms.
sentences.cn: 这家公司将以非常优惠的条件借钱给你.

sentences.en: The disease spreads quickly under favourable conditions .
sentences.cn: 这种病在合适的条件下会传播得很快。

sentences.en: The disease spreads quickly under favourable conditions.
sentences.cn: 这种病在合适的条件下会传播得很快。

sentences.en: The film bears favourable technical comparison with Hollywood productions costing 10 times as much.
sentences.cn: 该片与耗资为其10倍的好莱坞制作相比在技术上毫不逊色。

sentences.en: The journey leaves a favourable impression.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行给他们留下了良好的印象.

sentences.en: The response has been overwhelmingly favorable.
They suppressed news that was not favourable to them.
sentences.cn: 对他们不利的新闻他们就扣留下来.

sentences.en: We found that most people are favourable to the idea.
sentences.cn: 我们发现大多数人同意这个意见.

words.tran_cn: 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的
有利的；受到优待的；受到喜爱的
顺利地；有利地；好意地（等于favorably）
赞成；宠爱；帮助（favor的过去分词）；给…以恩惠

trans.tran_cn: 赞成的，给人好印象的，有利的，优惠的
trans.tran_en: a favourable report, opinion, or reaction shows that you think that someone or something is good or that you agree with them
